QuestData.Title: The Refiner's Fire
QuestData.Description: Beneath its porous exterior, this hunk of metal gleams with a mysterious quality.$b$bYou feel it would only be prudent to burn off the slag at Fjorn's Anvil.$b$bAs you ponder where in this frozen waste you might find something hot enough for the job, a fire revenant crosses your path...
QuestData.LogDescription: You must collect 10 Furious Sparks from the Seething Revenants at Frostfield Lake and then use the anvil at Fjorn's Anvil.
QuestData.CompletionText: The surface of the anvil is scalding, in sharp contrast with the wintry air.
QuestData.RewardText: You place the metal on the anvil and immediately upon adding the sparks they work the ore furiously.$b$bWhen at last they burn out, you are left with a large piece of metal that gleams with a light of its own.
